body: A leather or wooden scroll case easily holds four scrolls; you can cram more inside but retrieving any of them becomes a full-round action rather than a move action. You must destroy the scroll case to damage its contents (hardness 2 for leather or 5 for wood, 2 hit points, Break DC 15). A scroll case is not water-tight.
name: Scroll Case
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Gear/Goods and Services/Adventuring Gear/Scroll Case
